summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5691 for the improvement of Willow Street, from Beacon Avenue to Mars Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75283 as amended by Ordinance No. 75437, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
